About CO2e and The Green food Challenge

This challenge aims to raise awareness about the impact of our diets on the environment and offer some suggestions on possible changes. The application aims to make it easy to for users to get an estimate of their own dietary carbon impact.

Greenhouse gases contribute to climate change. The most discussed is carbon dioxide, but methane and nitrous oxide are also GHGs. In order to measure their impact, carbon dioxide equivalents (C02e) is used. For food production, the most common gas is methane.
